allow:
Bash(python3 -c "
content = ''''''# SANDRA IA 7.0 - IMMEDIATE ACTION CHECKLIST

Priority: URGENT - Before Staging Deployment
Time Required: 1-2 hours
Status: READY FOR EXECUTION

## PHASE 1: PRE-STAGING VERIFICATION (30 minutes)

### Step 1: Verify Netlify Environment Variables
Owner: CEO | Time: 15 minutes

Run: netlify env:list

Confirm these variables are set:
- OPENAI_API_KEY
- ANTHROPIC_API_KEY  
- GROQ_API_KEY
- CARTESIA_API_KEY
- CARTESIA_VOICE_ID

### Step 2: Test Build Locally
Owner: CEO | Time: 5 minutes

Run: npm run build

Expected: All optimizations complete, manifest and service worker generated.

### Step 3: Security Scan
Status: VERIFIED CLEAN by Quality Gate Agent

## PHASE 2: STAGING DEPLOYMENT (15 minutes)

### Step 4: Deploy to Staging
Run: npm run deploy:staging

Saves staging URL for testing.

### Step 5: Verify Deployment
Check staging URL:
- Page loads without errors
- Chat interface appears
- No console errors (F12)
- Mobile PWA works

## PHASE 3: FUNCTIONAL TESTING (30 minutes)

### Step 6: Test Chat
- Text chat works
- Voice conversation functional
- Error handling proper

### Step 7: Test Mobile PWA
iOS: Add to Home Screen from Safari
Android: Install app from Chrome

### Step 8: Monitor Logs
Run: netlify logs --live
Watch for errors, timeouts, API key issues

## PHASE 4: DOCUMENTATION (15 minutes)

### Step 9: Fix SECURITY.md
Replace real-looking examples with: sk-proj-EXAMPLE_YOUR_KEY_HERE

### Step 10: Document Staging URL
Create STAGING-ENVIRONMENT.md with URL, status, monitoring links

### Step 11: Share Test Plan
Distribute staging test plan to team (48-72 hour testing period)

## PHASE 5: MONITORING (10 minutes)

### Step 12: Enable Netlify Analytics
Set up alerts for function failures, build errors

### Step 13: Error Alerts
Configure alerts for API key errors, 500 errors, build failures

## COMPLETION CHECKLIST

Pre-Deployment:
- Netlify env vars verified
- Local build successful
- No secrets in code

Deployment:
- Staging deployed
- URL accessible
- No errors

Testing:
- Chat works
- Voice works
- Mobile PWA installs

Documentation:
- SECURITY.md fixed
- Staging documented
- Test plan shared

Monitoring:
- Analytics enabled
- Alerts configured
- Logs monitored

## SUCCESS METRICS

Staging successful if:
- All test cases pass
- No critical errors
- Response time < 5 seconds
- Error rate < 5%
- Mobile PWA functional

## NEXT STEPS

After 48-72 hours staging:
- Production readiness review
- Phase 12 accessibility work
- Production deployment planning

Generated: 2025-10-28
Owner: CEO Clayton
Validator: Enhanced Quality Gate Agent
''''''
with open(''IMMEDIATE-ACTION-CHECKLIST.md'', ''w'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    f.write(content)
print(''Checklist created successfully'')
")
